episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0100_: Well done, everyone! It felt great to go all out!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0200_:
I was surprised by your Sylveon, Calem. He was
so eager to battle!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0300_:
Yeah, my Sylveon may look cute, but he’s actually
really aggressive.
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0400_:
So much so, in fact, that he makes Pokémon like
Greninja look relatively tame...
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0500_:
In contrast, your Leafeon was amazingly
level-headed, Hilda!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0600_:
Even though folks say Pokémon take after their
Trainers...
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0700_: Huh?! Just what are you trying to say?!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0800_: Ah, never mind! Forget about it.
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_0900_:
I do see some similarities between you and
Glaceon, though, Hilbert.
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_1100_:
Yeah, like the serious look in your eyes when you
two attack with an Ice-type move...
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_1200_:
But of course, that does make it easier to predict
when you’re about to use a powerful attack.
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_1500_:
At any rate, we each seem to draw out our
partner’s unique traits in our own way!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_1600_:
That’s right! What we get out of Eevee’s different
Evolutions is up to us!
episode_event_eevee_2024/4001_1001_1700_:
I hope we can keep working well together with
our partners!
episode_event_eevee_2024/6801_1001_0100_: Wild Eevee are rare in Unova.
episode_event_eevee_2024/6801_1001_0200_: I’ve never encountered one there myself.
episode_event_eevee_2024/6801_1001_0300_:
Rosa told me that she saw a wild Eevee in
Castelia City once...
episode_event_eevee_2024/6801_1001_0400_: Really?! Where could it have been?!
